task.name: hif_makeimages
task.description:
Compute clean results from a list of specified targets.
Output:
results -- If pipeline mode is 'getinputs' then None is returned. Otherwise the results object for the pipeline task is returned.

param.name: vis
param.description: The list of input MeasurementSets. Defaults to the list of MeasurementSets specified in the h_init or hif_importdata task. '': use all MeasurementSets in the context Examples: 'ngc5921.ms', ['ngc5921a.ms', ngc5921b.ms', 'ngc5921c.ms']

param.name: target_list
param.description: Dictionary specifying targets to be imaged; blank will read list from context

param.name: hm_masking
param.description: Clean masking mode. Options are 'centralregion', 'auto', 'manual' and 'none'

param.name: hm_sidelobethreshold
param.description: sidelobethreshold * the max sidelobe level

param.name: hm_noisethreshold
param.description: noisethreshold * rms in residual image

param.name: hm_lownoisethreshold
param.description: lownoisethreshold * rms in residual image

param.name: hm_negativethreshold
param.description: negativethreshold * rms in residual image

param.name: hm_minbeamfrac
param.description: Minimum beam fraction for pruning

param.name: hm_growiterations
param.description: Number of binary dilation iterations for growing the mask

param.name: hm_dogrowprune
param.description: Do pruning on the grow mask

param.name: hm_minpercentchange
param.description: Mask size change threshold

param.name: hm_fastnoise
param.description: Faster noise calucation for automask or nsigma stopping

param.name: hm_nsigma
param.description: Multiplicative factor for rms-based threshold stopping

param.name: hm_perchanweightdensity
param.description: Calculate the weight density for each channel independently

param.name: hm_npixels
param.description: Number of pixels to determine uv-cell size for super-uniform weighting

param.name: hm_cleaning
param.description: Pipeline cleaning mode

param.name: tlimit
param.description: Times the sensitivity limit for cleaning

param.name: masklimit
param.description: Times good mask pixels for cleaning

param.name: cleancontranges
param.description: Clean continuum frequency ranges in cubes

param.name: calcsb
param.description: Force (re-)calculation of sensitivities and beams

param.name: mosweight
param.description: Mosaic weighting

param.name: overwrite_on_export
param.description: Replace existing image products when h/hifa/hifv_exportdata is called. If False, images that would have the same FITS name on export, are amended to include a version number. For example, if oussid.J1248-4559_ph.spw21.mfs.I.pbcor.fits would already be exported by a previous call to hif_makeimags, then 'oussid.J1248-4559_ph.spw21.mfs.I.pbcor.v2.fits' would also be exported to the products/ directory. The first exported product retains the same name. Additional products start counting with 'v2', 'v3', etc.

param.name: parallel
param.description: Clean images using MPI cluster

param.name: pipelinemode
param.description: The pipeline operating mode. In 'automatic' mode the pipeline determines the values of all context defined pipeline inputs automatically. In 'interactive' mode the user can set the pipeline context defined parameters manually. In 'getinputs' mode the user can check the settings of all pipeline parameters without running the task.

param.name: dryrun
param.description: Run the task (False) or just display the command (True)

param.name: acceptresults
param.description: Add the results to the pipeline context
